list.description:
Sight with ranging lines every 50m rather than the default 200m.

Useful for the low velocity cannon on the CEV and Centurion AVRE

Modified version of https://live.warthunder.com/post/1077427/ru/ (from 2023)

#728 #cev #m728 #m728cev #728cev #avre

#clashroyale #meme
Всем привет это мой новый прицел по мему.Что лучше делать про аниме или мемы?
Hello everyone, this is my new meme target.Which is better to do about anime or memes?

Symbols LANGUAGE MOD
This is a fork of WoWmaker`s UI (language) mod.

I really liked the original idea but it was old. It was missing symbols for helicopters and ships for the main menu and for ground battles when you enter enemy spawn. I also removed chat part of the mod as I found it confusing. Other symbols were changed to a 1 instead of 3 per message. Bunch of meme/funny messages were also changed.

Wowmaker`s original mod = https://live.warthunder.com/post/1057340/en/

Instructions on how to install-->

1. Open file config.blk in the game folder with Notepad++ (or similar...

Valkyrie
Modern MBT sighs

Includes 4 sights. Three main sight variations with less lines so they fit preset options better if you like them more and one for AA or missile vehicles.

It has a moveable indicator which are the two squares on each side and asymmetric lines with a dot next a crosshair. They show you what is the current position of your barrel.

Update-> Added one sight with zero adjustment if you didnt unlock laser rangefinder yet.

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

As my second sight i decided to create our lord and savior the legendary Audi RS2 as a sight in War Thunder

10 sights with 3 sizes
-whole screen big
-1/4 size has 5 different places on the screen
-1/16 size has 4 different places on the screen

#audi #audiRS2 #car

Made my first ever sight so it is not perfect as to excpect but it works well enough

2 pictures to show how it looks in game both without zooma nd with zoom (note that the tank i was using is the german rank 7 premium "Leopard 2 (PzBtl 123) wich has 12X zoom at most so the zoom can be more in or out depending on the tank)

The sight is the Hand symbol that Alucard does in Hellsing Ultimate

Also i forgot the change the zip files name so its just the name the pc gives it in Finnish

#hellsing #hellsing_ultimate #alucard #anime
